name: Hi-Fi Snake
description:
The game was made during an internal Gamejam of the company Manifesto Games. Our only intent was to finish the jam with a casual game with classic twists.

If you like pacman and snake arcade games, then Hi-fi Snake is the game for you! The game is a mix of the classic Snake with Pacman 256 and the hyper-casual Snake vs Blocks. Explore the internet as you navigate digital mazes and escape the lava bytes!

HOW TO PLAY

Play with the Hi-Fi Robot, collecting data gems around the scene to unlock paths to new areas. Do not collide with walls, byte lava or your own data gems tail. Each run you unlock currencies to buy new skins for your character (data is saved in your browser).

Use the arrows or AWSD to move the Hi-Fi robot around the scene.
